name: MethodologyID_valid
description: URL address is valid and can be found on the internet.

name: methodology_MethodologyID_fk
description: Online identifier for methodology needs to be a foreign key

name: methodology_MethodologyID
description: Online identifier for methodology

name: SamplingDevice
description: Device used to collect sample and dimensions

name: AirFiltration
description: Is there HEPA air filtration system in the lab?

name: AirFiltrationType
description: What is the type of HEPA air filtration system in the lab?

name: ClothingPolicy
description: Is synthetic clothing restricted from the lab?

name: NonplasticPolicy
description: Are synthetic materials restricted from contacting the sample?

name: SealedEnvironment
description: Is a sealed environment used to minimize contamination?

name: SealedEnvironmentType
description: Type of sealed environment used?

name: SieveMeshSizes
description: Mesh sizes of seives used (um)

name: FilterType
description: Filter material type

name: FilterDiameter_blank
description: Diameter of filter in mm must not be blank

name: FilterDiameter
description: Diameter of filter in mm

name: FilterPoreSize_blank
description: Filter pore size in um

name: FilterPoreSize
description: Filter pore size in um

name: VisIDMethod
description: Visual confirmation methods used e.g. visual microscopy SEM

name: VisualSoftware
description: Software used for visual analysis

name: PickingStrategy
description: Picked wet or picked dry

name: VisMagnification
description: Magnification of the microscope during the visual image in times e.g. 40

name: MatIDMethod
description: Material identification method e.g. pygcms, raman, ftir

name: MatIDSoftware
description: Material ID software used

name: ParticleID_blank
description: Unique ID for each particle cannot be blank

name: ParticleID
description: Unique ID for each particle must be unique

name: particle_methodologyID_fk
description: Online identifier for methodology needs to be a foreign key

name: particle_MethodologyID_blank
description: Online identifier for methodology cannot be blank

name: particle_MethodologyID_doc
description: Online identifier for methodology must end with .pdf

name: particle_MethodologyID_url
description: Online identifier for methodology must be a url address beginning with ftp, http, https, or www.

name: particle_SampleID_fk
description: Unique ID for sample needs to be a foreign key

name: particle_SampleID
description: Unique ID for sample

name: PhotoID
description: URL address for photo of particle

name: PhotoID_madatory
description: URL address for photo of particle is mandatory and cannot be blank

name: PhotoID_url
description: URL address for photo of particle must start with ftp, http, https, or www.

name: SpectraID_madatory
description: URL address for spectra of particle is mandatory and cannot be blank.

name: SpectraID_doc
description: URL address for spectra of particle must link to a document with type csv, asp, spa, spc, jdx, rds, qs, json, yaml, zip, or 0-9

name: SpectraID_web
description: URL address for spectra of particle must start with ftp, http, https, or www.

name: FinalAnalysisDate
description: The date the analysis for the particle was finalized.

name: Comments
description: Any comments about the particle analysis

name: Polymer
description: Particle polymer name

name: Morphology
description: Particle morphology

name: Color
description: Particle color

name: Length
description: Particle size longest dimension (um)

name: Width
description: Particle size shortest dimension (um)

name: Height
description: Third particle dimension (um)

name: Mass
description: Particle mass (mg)

name: SurfaceArea
description: Particle projected surface area (um^3)

name: Volume
description: Particle projected volume

name: Tactile
description: Particle tactile features

name: sample_SampleID_fk
description: Unique ID for Sample, values must be unique and non missing in this table

name: sample_SampleID
description: Unique ID for Sample, values must be unique and non missing in this table

name: sample_SampleID_blank
description: Unique ID for Sample, values must be unique and non missing in this table

name: OwnerOrganization
description: Unique ID for organization who owns the sample
valid_example: Moore Institute for Plastic Pollution Research

name: AnalysisOrganization
description: Unique ID for organization who analyzed the sample
valid_example: Moore Institute for Plastic Pollution Research

name: ReportingOrganization
description: Unique ID for organization who reported the sample results
valid_example: Moore Institute for Plastic Pollution Research

name: Latitude
description: Latitude of sample in decimal degrees

name: Latitude_blank
description: Latitude of sample in decimal degrees cannot be blank

name: Longitude
description: Longitude of sample in decimal degrees

name: Longitude_blank
description: Longitude of sample in decimal degrees

name: CollectionStartDateTime
description: Sample Collection Start Date Time in Year-Month-Day 24hr format

name: CollectionEndDateTime
description: Sample Collection End Date Time in Year-Month-Day 24hr format

name: SampleVolume
description: Volume of sample (L), must be between 1 and 1,000,000

name: SampleVolume_blank
description: Volume of sample (L), must be between 1 and 1,000,000 and cannot be blank

name: SampleType
description: SampleType must be one of Blank, Spike, or Environmental

name: Matrix
description: Matrix must be one of the allowed values

name: SiteName
description: SiteName should describe the site with a name relevant to the project and should not be NA

name: MatIDThreshold
description: MatIDThreshold should describe the hit quality threshold used to determine whether or not an id is certain.

name: SpikedRecovery
description: SpikedRecovery should describe the percentage of particles recovered using spiked recovery experiments from 1-100

name: Sample_spatial
description: Spatial file for where the samples were collected should be a geojson file.

name: Blank_contamination
description: BlankContamination should describe the number of particles which contaminate each blank sample collected with this methodology on average.
